solution_line_template: On Monday, {monday_hours} hours of rain at a rate of {monday_rate} inch per hour is {monday_hours}*{monday_rate}=<<{monday_hours}*{monday_rate}={monday_rainfall}>>{monday_rainfall} inches of rain.

On Tuesday, {tuesday_hours} hours of rain at a rate of {tuesday_rate} inches per hour is {tuesday_hours}*{tuesday_rate}=<<{tuesday_hours}*{tuesday_rate}={tuesday_rainfall}>>{tuesday_rainfall} inches of rain.
Twice the rate of Tuesday is {twice_multiplier}*{tuesday_rate}=<<{twice_multiplier}*{tuesday_rate}={wednesday_rate}>>{wednesday_rate} inches per hour.

Wednesday, {wednesday_hours} hours of rain at a rate of {wednesday_rate} inches per hour is {wednesday_hours}*{wednesday_rate}=<<{wednesday_hours}*{wednesday_rate}={wednesday_rainfall}>>{wednesday_rainfall} inches of rain.

The combined total of the rainfall for these three days is {monday_rainfall}+{tuesday_rainfall}+{wednesday_rainfall}=<<{monday_rainfall}+{tuesday_rainfall}+{wednesday_rainfall}={total_rainfall}>>{total_rainfall} inches of rain.
